name: Heavy Steel Demo
description: Mecha game inspired by armored core games made for a 32 bit jam. Also submitted to mechjam 2 but receieved permission from host to work on it only during 32 bit jam as that is also 2 weeks long and starts earlier than mechjam 2. Don't expect to rank decently, yet alone win either jam, but its been a fun learning experience. Sorry didn't have time to add sound, most likely won't continue work on project. I'm not as good with making 3D art assets as a I am with 2D art assets and this is my first time trying to make a 32 bit aesthetic. If you got any tips or pointers go ahead! Also sorry, there seems to be a weird quirk where if you relaunch the game after exiting it it messes up the resolution/fullscreen mode. I'm not too familiar with making UE4 run in a different aspect ratio and resolution. Controls in game main menu.
